content: Hey @Tim Abbott have you looked at this? https://matrix.org/

I think the zulip team is familiar with the products, platforms, and specifications in this space :-) What's the question?

(This feels like "Hey Grahame, have you looked at this? https://openehr.org".)

well, I would've expected one of three answers:

  1. Oh? we'll have a look
  2. We know about and are planning / working on an integration
  3. We know about it, but we don't think that it'll work because X (topics?)

I imagine the challenges with this kind of integration include data models -- if you are connecting a zulip instance to a slack bridge or an IRC bridge, and the Slack/IRC folks don't have topics on their messages... You only get some slice of the functionality
